title: Graph realization problem
summary: The graph realization problem is a decision problem in graph theory. Given a finite sequence ( d 1 , … , d n ) {\displaystyle (d_{1},\dots ,d_{n})} of natural numbers, the problem asks whether there is a labeled simple graph such that ( d 1 , … , d n ) {\displaystyle (d_{1},\dots ,d_{n})} is the degree sequence of this graph.
